Body:
reshaped_trials, labels, num_of_seq, trials_per_sequence = trial_reshaper(
    trial_target_info=self.target_info, timing_info=self.timing_info,
    eeg_data=self.eeg, fs=256, k=2, mode='calibration', channel_map=self.
    channel_map)
self.assertTrue(len(reshaped_trials) == self.channel_number,
    f'len is {len(reshaped_trials)} not {self.channel_number}')
self.assertEqual(len(reshaped_trials[0]), 3)
self.assertEqual(num_of_seq, 1)
self.assertEqual(trials_per_sequence, 3)
